Articles.Content:
so ksp 1.1 has entered experimental testing.

but ksp 1.1 stil not release on steam and pc

only release on youtuber/streamers only

i just wait for ksp 1.1, it will release on April 1st or More

 

Thanks For Reading this forum

 

-CraftedDoge20
Pssst... this was announced here on the forums three weeks ago:

KSP Is in experimentals for a while now. But now video makers are allowed to make videos of it and I'm totally happy about it. Now we can watch all the cool stuff that awaits us, but also see, why it's still in experimental. There are still a few bugs left. I watched the stream of Jimorian for a while and in a very short time he triggered three bugs. And all stuff that would happen to me as well. And one was game breaking as well, so he almost lost Jeb.

With the pre-release such bugs would be reported over and over again and it's good to test this in a small circle with people knowing how to report a bug and providing all the necessary details to recreate (and then fix) the bug. I'm very thankful that Squad decided to let 1.1 be shown. Now we can watch and wait.
I seriously don't understand the goal of the OP's post....
If you can't wait and need to vent some excitement for the release of 1.1 , I will direct you to the 1.1 hype train

Hey man, usernames can't be valid forever you know. 

Edited March 27, 2016 by klesh

As has already been remarked, 1.1's entry into experimentals has been long since announced.

If you're just so excited about 1.1's imminent arrival, can't contain yourself, and need to vent, here's a great place to do so:
How do you download 1.1 if you are on steam?

1 minute ago, sp1989 said:

How do you download 1.1 if you are on steam?

 

1.1 has not been released or pre-released yet. When it does, you can choose the option via right clicking and choosing properties.

1 minute ago, Frybert said:

1.1 has not been released or pre-released yet. When it does, you can choose the option via right clicking and choosing properties.

 

Oh ok the OP made it sound like the experimentals were available to steamers and youtubers.
Not the experimentals, but there is an open Beta starting soon™, which will be available via Steam.
whoops! i mean pre=release steam are nowavailable on steam beta  EDIT : its My Account "indeed changing to Kdoge20playsksp1_1_pre-release instead CraftedDoge20"
Thank you so much for once again giving all of us relevant news in a time fashion.
